attributes.action: Reduce the tax on pertol prices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In response to the Lorry drivers that staged a protest at the rising cost of fuel this petition is to demand the government lower fuel taxes.

As well as increasing the average shopping bill hauliers say diesel prices topping 120p a litre, plus the planned 2p fuel tax rise, will drive firms "to the wall".

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
